title: Beef and mushroom ragout
ingredients: ['500g shin beef or chuck steak', '2 tablespoons flour, gluten free plain flour or rice flour', 'olive oil, for frying', '1 large onion, chopped', '150g mushrooms, sliced', '150g diced bacon, low fat', '100ml red wine', '400g tin chopped tomatoes', '100ml beef stock', '2 or 3 sprigs thyme']
